item.title: Hisense introduces new televisions in Malaysia in anticipation of the World Cup
item.description:
Hisense, a global technology company and official sponsor of the 2018 FIFA World Cup, recently introduced new high-definition televisions to the Malaysian market. Andy Huang, Managing Director of Hisense Malaysia, highlighted the positive reception of their previous television models and their commitment to delivering an exceptional viewing experience. With the anticipation of the 2018 FIFA World Cup approaching, Hisense aims to enhance the football viewing experience for fans with their latest offerings: the U9A, U7A, and Laser TV...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/hisense-introduces-new-televisions-in-malaysia-in-anticipation-of-the-world-cup/
